Posts.Content: Alirubyo Hi, I have been at the point of giving up the chemo as the mouth ulcers were becoming unbearable.  I am now gargling with Gelclair 3 times a day, bicarbonate often, nystatin and also have a handy spray (from my dentist) called Benzydamine.  On this round of chemo the consultant suggested sucking ice cubes before, during and after treatment, and so far it seems to be having a positive effect.  Please speak with the staff in your clinic, anything is worth a try. Posts.Content: Hi  I am having chemo at moment and hospita  gave saline mouth washes and  mixturecalled caphosol plus adult bongela .this stopped the ulcers which were developing . I also has a burning reaction whenever i ate like hot curry but that has gone since i stopped a particulat antibiotic  As for prevention im told a spoon of cod liver oil vit d and a  drop .so far so good  Although taste bud not fully operational
